description:
The IPA platform provides probabilistic annotation of intrinsically disordered regions (IDRs). It standardizes computational feature prediction using a reverse Bayes approach to transform logistic regression outputs into true probabilities, effectively removing the influence of training data priors.

Preprint: https://www.biorxiv.org/content/10.1101/2024.12.18.629275.full
name: IPA (IDR Probabilistic Annotations)
